input_descriptions.content_type: A string representing the type of content to generate.
input_descriptions.main_goal: A string representing the main goal of the content generation task.
input_descriptions.sub_goal: A string representing the sub-goal of the content generation task.
input_descriptions.instruction: An optional string containing any specific instruction to follow during content generation.

output_descriptions.generated_content: A string containing the generated content based on the input content type, goals, and instruction.
